code: import{GET_EMAIL_TYPES,WATCH_EMAIL,GET_ALL_EMAILS}from'../actionTypes';export var fetchAllEmail=function fetchAllEmail(){return{type:WATCH_EMAIL};};export var getAllEmails=function getAllEmails(data){return{type:GET_ALL_EMAILS,payload:data};};export var getAllTypes=function getAllTypes(result){return{type:GET_EMAIL_TYPES,payload:result};};export var groupBy=function groupBy(array,f){var groups={};array.forEach(function(o){var group=f(o)[0];groups[group]=groups[group]||[];groups[group].push(o);});return groups;};
